trans-unit.source: See details of how the depreciation is calculated.

seg-source.mrk: See details of how the depreciation is calculated.

trans-unit.source: The <uicontrol>Depreciation Calculation</uicontrol> enables you to clearly see the origin of the asset values by identifying the various levels of the calculations and depreciation terms involved. Here you can see step-by-step, detailed information for the depreciation values calculated. This applies for each real depreciation area, each currency type, and each depreciation type.

seg-source.mrk: The <uicontrol>Depreciation Calculation</uicontrol> enables you to clearly see the origin of the asset values by identifying the various levels of the calculations and depreciation terms involved.
Here you can see step-by-step, detailed information for the depreciation values calculated.
This applies for each real depreciation area, each currency type, and each depreciation type.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>[折舊計算]</uicontrol> 可讓您透過識別涉及的各種計算和折舊條件，清楚查看資產值來源。
您可在此針對計算出的折舊值，查看逐步的詳細資訊。
適用各實際折舊範圍、各幣別類型和各折舊類型。

trans-unit.source: The system displays the asset balance at the start of the fiscal year, as well as the depreciation planned on the balance. In addition to this, a list is displayed showing all changes to APC values in the current year with the corresponding adjustments to planned annual depreciation.

seg-source.mrk: The system displays the asset balance at the start of the fiscal year, as well as the depreciation planned on the balance.
In addition to this, a list is displayed showing all changes to APC values in the current year with the corresponding adjustments to planned annual depreciation.

target.mrk: 系統在會計年度開始時顯示資產餘額，與在餘額計劃的折舊。
除此之外，清單會顯示本年度取得和生產成本 (APC) 值的所有更改，與針對計劃年度折舊的對應調整。
